panels.visual: Party descending into Elven Sanctum Cavern of quiet grandeur Colored glows everywhere - emerald, silver-blue, lavender, golden, prismatic Orrery at center - magnificent crystal and metal structure Lenses suspended in air Lord Alric on raised dais with drow conspirators Dramatic lighting from above Lord Alric: "Ah.
